com.opensource.bitmapfun.ui

类 ImageDetailFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.opensource.bitmapfun.ui.ImageDetailFragment
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ImageDetailFragment
extends Fragment
    This fragment will populate the children of the ViewPager from ImageDetailActivity.

    • 方法详细资料

      • newInstance

        public static ImageDetailFragment newInstance(int imageNum)
        Factory method to generate a new instance of the fragment given an image number.
        参数:
        imageNum - The image number within the parent adapter to load
        返回:
        A new instance of ImageDetailFragment with imageNum extras

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Populate image number from extra, use the convenience factory method newInstance(int) to create this fragment.

      • cancelWork

        public void cancelWork()
        Cancels the asynchronous work taking place on the ImageView, called by the adapter backing the ViewPager when the child is destroyed.
